title: game-feature
description: Implement a new game feature with design, implementation, and testing

title: Design the Feature
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Think about the architecture and design of the feature.
- Define the data structures needed
- Plan the component hierarchy
- Consider edge cases and error handling

title: Test the Feature
description:
Test the implementation thoroughly.
- Write unit tests
- Test edge cases
- Verify performance

title: Polish and Submit
description:
Final polish and submit for review.
- Code cleanup
- Documentation
- Create PR

title: Implement the Feature
description:
Build the feature based on the design.
- Create necessary components
- Implement game logic
- Add styling and animations
